attributes.title: House Tully
heir: Sansa Stark (assumed due to the alleged deaths of Bran and Rickon Stark)
attributes.sigil: A silver trout leaping on a red and blue background.

sections.Relationships:
===Members===
* Lord {[[Hoster Tully]]}, Lord of Riverrun and Lord Paramount of the Riverlands. Deceased after a long sickness.
** His wife Lady {[[Minisa Tully|Minisa]]} of [[House Whent]]. Died in childbirth.
*** {[[Catelyn Stark|Catelyn]]}, his eldest daughter and widow of Lord {[[Eddard Stark]]}. (deceased)
***
*** {[[Lysa Arryn|Lysa]]}, his youngest daughter and widow of Lord {[[Jon Arryn]]}. Lady Regent of [[the Eyrie]]Â until she is killed byÂ [[Petyr Baelish|Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish]].
*** Lord [[Edmure Tully]], his son and heir, Lord of Riverrun and Lord Paramount of the Riverlands, stripped of his lands and titles.
****His wife Lady [[Roslin Frey|Roslin]] of [[House Frey]], status unknown.
* Ser [[Brynden Tully]], called "the Blackfish," his younger brother.

===Sworn to House Tully===
* [[House Blackwood]] of [[Raventree Hall]].
* [[House Bracken]] of [[Stone Hedge]].
* {[[House Darry]]} of Darry, presumed extinct.
* [[House Frey]] of [[the Twins]], now also Lords of Riverrun.
**[[House Erenford]], sworn to House Frey.
* [[House Mallister]] of [[Seagard]].
* [[House Mooton]] of [[Maidenpool]].
* [[House Smallwood]] of [[Acorn Hall]].
* [[House Whent]] of [[Harrenhal]], currently in exile, possibly extinct.
**[[House Wode]], sworn to House Whent.

===Vassals and allies===
* Lord [[Walder Frey]], called "the Late Lord Frey", Lord of the Crossing and Lord of Riverrun. Betrayer and orchestrator of the [[Red Wedding]]
* Lord [[Jonos Bracken]], Lord of Stone Hedge
* Lord [[Jason Mallister]], Lord of Seagard
* Lady [[Shella Whent]], Lady of Harrenhal, possibly deceased

[[Image:House Tully banner.jpg|thumb|right|200px|The banner of [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]], the rulers of the [[Riverlands]].]]
{{Quote|'Family, Duty, Honor.' Every Tully child learns our words. But I was a woman before I understood them.|[[Catelyn Tully]]|Robert's Rebellion (Histories & Lore)}}
'''House Tully''' is one of the [[Great Houses]] of [[Westeros]]. Its most senior member carries the title of [[Lord of Riverrun]] and [[Lord Paramount of the Trident]]. The current head is Lord [[Edmure Tully]], son of the late [[Hoster Tully]]. The Tully sigil is a silver trout on a red and blue background. Their motto is '''"Family, Duty, Honor."'''

At the onset of the [[War of the Five Kings]], [[House Tully]] came under attack by [[House Lannister]] and lent its support for [[House Stark]] when they came to their aid in the liberation of the Riverlands. House Tully has since been [[Attainting|formally stripped]] of lands and titles for rebellion against the [[Iron Throne]], with Lord Edmure a [[hostage|captive]] of [[House Frey]] following the [[Red Wedding]].Â
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Tully is an old house which has held the castle at [[Riverrun]] for some centuries, but did not rise to greatness until King Aegon I's invasion. Aegon drove the ironborn out of the Riverlands and appointed Lord Edmyn Tully as the overlord of the area in thanks for his support during the Conquest. The Tullys joined the [[House Stark|Starks]], [[House Baratheon|Baratheons]] and [[House Arryn|Arryns]] in rising against the Mad King, providing numerous troops for [[Robert Baratheon]]'s armies.

The Tully banner is different in the books than in the series. In the TV series, it is striped horizontally, with one large red section and one large blue section, separated by white stripes. In the novels it has five ''vertical'' stripes of equal width; two muddy-red stripes separate three blue stripes (and there are no white stripes).

The following sworn houses have yet to appear in the series:
* House Piper of [[Pinkmaiden]]
* House Ryger of Willow Wood
* House Vance of Wayfarer's Rest
* House Vance of Atranta
* House Paege
